name: jquery-throttle-debounce
description: jQuery throttle / debounce allows you to rate-limit your functions in multiple useful ways. Passing a delay and callback to `$.throttle` returns a new function that will execute no more than once every `delay` milliseconds. Passing a delay and callback to `$.debounce` returns a new function that will execute only once, coalescing multiple sequential calls into a single execution at either the very beginning or end.
